issue.title: Suppress noisy basic auth token deletion log

repository.name: etcd
repository.description: Distributed reliable key-value store for the most critical data of a distributed system

issue.body:
Right now the basic auth tokens that are deleted after `--auth-token-ttl` cause info-level logs to be emitted. Change this to debug. This helps with the issue at #18244 where calling `/readyz` frequently pollutes the etcd server logs with this log message.

Fixes #18244.

Cherry-picked into 3.5.x release https://github.com/etcd-io/etcd/pull/18265

issue.title: change deleted a simple token log to debug level from info level.

repository.name: etcd
repository.description: Distributed reliable key-value store for the most critical data of a distributed system

body: @ahmetb, can you help backporting the fix to `release-3.5`? Thanks
@ivanvc requires org member permissions, if you have them, please rerun the command on the PR.
Ah, we used to do backports manually; we recently enabled the cherrypick plugin. Let me give it a try, but if it needs manual intervention, I don't think I'm allowed to work on top of that branch.
@ahmetb, can you open a PR to update 3.5's CHANGELOG with the backport?
